title: Process a Subcontractor Lien Waiver
description: Along with their monthly invoice, a subcontractor has submitted a conditional lien waiver. The accountant must process it.

tasks.description: Receive the invoice and the attached conditional lien waiver document.
Verify that the amount and 'through date' on the lien waiver match the invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the details on the waiver are correct.

tasks.description: Log the received lien waiver in the project's lien tracking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lien waiver is successfully logged and filed.
